mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT il.id, il.barcode, il.dispatch, il.orderno, il.operation, il.CREATION_DATE, il.posting_date, il.yeild, il.work_scrap, il.row_scrap, il.classgrp, il.model_no, il.line, il.plant, il.CREATED_BY, il.attr1, il.attr2, il.attr3, il.attr4, il.attr5, il.attr6, il.attr7, il.attr8, il.attr9, il.attr10, il.attr11, il.attr12, il.attr13, il.attr14, il.attr15, r.mat_desc, r.material, r.confirmation_no, r.confirmation_pos, u.user_name, r.operation_desc, r.fevor, r.fevor_txt, l.msgty, l.msgtx FROM confirmation_input_log il,confirmation_result r,sys_user u,confirmation_log l
il.id= r.input_id AND il.CREATED_BY = u.user_id AND l.ref_id = il.id AND l.tran_type = '0' And il.BGUUID = #{bguuid}

SELECT DISTINCT il.id, il.barcode, il.dispatch, il.orderno, il.operation, il.CREATION_DATE, il.posting_date, il.yeild, il.work_scrap, il.row_scrap, il.classgrp, il.model_no, il.line, il.plant, il.CREATED_BY, il.attr1, il.attr2, il.attr3, il.attr4, il.attr5, il.attr6, il.attr7, il.attr8, il.attr9, il.attr10, il.attr11, il.attr12, il.attr13, il.attr14, il.attr15, r.mat_desc, r.material, r.confirmation_no, r.confirmation_pos, u.user_name, r.operation_desc, r.fevor, r.fevor_txt, l.msgty, l.msgtx FROM confirmation_input_log il,confirmation_result r,sys_user u,confirmation_log l
il.id= r.input_id AND il.CREATED_BY = u.user_id AND l.ref_id = il.id AND l.tran_type = '1' And il.CXUUID = #{bguuid}

SELECT il.orderno, il.barcode, il.dispatch, il.operation, il.classgrp, il.model_no, il.line, il.attr6, il.attr7 FROM confirmation_input_log il,confirmation_result r,confirmation_log l
il.dispatch = #{dispatch} AND il.operation = #{operation} AND il.id= r.input_id AND l.ref_id = il.id AND l.tran_type = '0' AND l.msgty = 'S' AND r.is_reversed = '0'
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

select * from confirmation_input_log i inner join confirmation_result r on i.id = r.input_id inner join confirmation_log l on i.id = l.ref_id
i.dispatch = #{dispatch} and i.operation = #{operation} and r.is_reversed = '0' and l.msgty = 'S' and l.tran_type = '0'

select * from confirmation_input_log i inner join confirmation_result r on i.id = r.input_id inner join confirmation_log l on i.id = l.ref_id
i.dispatch = #{dispatch} and i.operation > #{operation} and r.is_reversed = '0' and l.msgty = 'S' and l.tran_type = '0'

select * from confirmation_input_log i inner join confirmation_result r on i.id = r.input_id inner join confirmation_log l on i.id = l.ref_id
i.dispatch = #{dispatch} and i.operation = #{operation} and r.is_reversed = '0' and l.msgty = 'S' and l.tran_type = '0' and r.confirmation_no = #{confirmationNo} and r.confirmation_pos = #{confirmationPos}

select MAX(ci.operation) as operation from confirmation_input_log ci inner join confirmation_log l on l.ref_id = ci.id
ci.orderno = #{orderno} and #{operation} > ci.operation and l.msgty = 'S'

select * from confirmation_input_log i inner join confirmation_result r on i.id = r.input_id inner join confirmation_log l on i.id = l.ref_id
i.dispatch = #{dispatch} and i.operation = #{operation} and r.is_reversed = '0' and l.msgty = 'S' and l.tran_type = '0'

select * from confirmation_input_log i inner join confirmation_result r on i.id = r.input_id inner join confirmation_log l on i.id = l.ref_id
i.barcode = #{barcode} and r.is_reversed = "0" and l.msgty = 'S' and l.tran_type = '0'

select * from confirmation_input_log i inner join confirmation_result r on i.id = r.input_id inner join confirmation_log l on i.id = l.ref_id
i.dispatch = #{dispatch} and i.operation = #{operation} and r.is_reversed = '0' and l.msgty = 'S' and l.tran_type = '0'

SELECT MAX(il.operation) AS operation from confirmation_input_log il INNER JOIN confirmation_result r on il.id = r.input_id INNER JOIN confirmation_log l on l.ref_id = il.id
r.is_reversed = '0' and l.tran_type = '0' and l.msgty = 'S' and il.dispatch = #{dispatch}

SELECT DISTINCT il.id, il.barcode, il.dispatch, il.orderno, il.operation, il.CREATION_DATE, il.posting_date, il.yeild, il.work_scrap, il.row_scrap, il.classgrp, il.model_no, il.line, il.plant, il.CREATED_BY, il.attr1, il.attr2, il.attr3, il.attr4, il.attr5, il.attr6, il.attr7, il.attr8, il.attr9, il.attr10, il.attr11, il.attr12, il.attr13, il.attr14, il.attr15, r.mat_desc, r.material, r.confirmation_no, r.confirmation_pos, u.user_name, r.operation_desc, r.fevor, r.fevor_txt FROM confirmation_input_log il,confirmation_result r,sys_user u,confirmation_log l
il.id= r.input_id AND il.CREATED_BY = u.user_id AND l.ref_id = il.id AND r.is_reversed ='0' AND l.tran_type = '0' AND l.msgty = 'S' AND il.dispatch = #{dispatch} and il.operation = #{operation}

select * from confirmation_input_log
BGUUID = #{bguuid}

select * from confirmation_input_log
CXUUID = #{cxuuid}
